verses.text: \w When|strong="H1696"\w* Ephraim \w spake|strong="H1696"\w*, there \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w trembling|strong="H7578"\w*; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w exalted|strong="H5375"\w* \w himself|strong="H1931"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w but|strong="H1696"\w* \w when|strong="H1696"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* offended \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Baal|strong="H1168"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w more|strong="H3254"\w*, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w molten|strong="H4541"\w* \w images|strong="H4541"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \w even|strong="H6213"\w* \w idols|strong="H6091"\w* \w according|strong="H3701"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* own \w understanding|strong="H8394"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w craftsmen|strong="H2796"\w*: \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w say|strong="H3254"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w*, \w Let|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* \w kiss|strong="H5401"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w calves|strong="H5695"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H6051"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w dew|strong="H2919"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w passeth|strong="H1980"\w* \w early|strong="H7925"\w* \w away|strong="H1980"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w chaff|strong="H4671"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3651"\w* driven \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w whirlwind|strong="H5590"\w* \w out|strong="H1980"\w* \w of|strong="H1637"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* threshing-floor, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w smoke|strong="H6227"\w* \w out|strong="H1980"\w* \w of|strong="H1637"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* chimney.

\w Yet|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* shalt \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w god|strong="H3068"\w* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w me|strong="H3467"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w besides|strong="H2108"\w* \w me|strong="H3467"\w* \w there|strong="H3045"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w saviour|strong="H3467"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3045"\w* did \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thee \w in|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*, \w in|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3045"\w* land \w of|strong="H4057"\w* great \w drought|strong="H8514"\w*.

\w According|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w pasture|strong="H4830"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w were|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w*; \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w were|strong="H5921"\w* \w filled|strong="H7646"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w was|strong="H3820"\w* \w exalted|strong="H7311"\w*: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w have|strong="H7646"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H5921"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w unto|strong="H1870"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lion|strong="H7826"\w*; \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w leopard|strong="H5246"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w watch|strong="H7789"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*;

\w I|strong="H8033"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w meet|strong="H6298"\w* \w them|strong="H6298"\w* \w as|strong="H8033"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bear|strong="H1677"\w* \w that|strong="H2416"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w bereaved|strong="H7909"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w her|strong="H7167"\w* whelps, \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w rend|strong="H7167"\w* \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w caul|strong="H5458"\w* \w of|strong="H7704"\w* \w their|strong="H7167"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*; \w and|strong="H8033"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w I|strong="H8033"\w* devour \w them|strong="H6298"\w* \w like|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lioness|strong="H3833"\w*; \w the|strong="H8033"\w* \w wild|strong="H7704"\w* \w beast|strong="H2416"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w tear|strong="H7167"\w* \w them|strong="H6298"\w*.

\w It|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3478"\w* \w thy|strong="H7843"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7843"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \add thou art\add* against \w me|strong="H3588"\w*, against \w thy|strong="H7843"\w* \w help|strong="H5828"\w*.

Where \w now|strong="H5414"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w may|strong="H4428"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*? \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w thy|strong="H5414"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*, \w of|strong="H4428"\w* whom \w thou|strong="H5414"\w* saidst, \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*?

\w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w mine|strong="H5414"\w* \w anger|strong="H5678"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w have|strong="H5414"\w* \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6887"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H2403"\w* Ephraim \w is|strong="H5771"\w* \w bound|strong="H6887"\w* \w up|strong="H6845"\w*; \w his|strong="H6845"\w* \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w is|strong="H5771"\w* laid \w up|strong="H6845"\w* \w in|strong="H2403"\w* \w store|strong="H6845"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w sorrows|strong="H2256"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* travailing \w woman|strong="H3205"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w come|strong="H3205"\w* \w upon|strong="H5975"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w*: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w unwise|strong="H2450"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tarry|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w place|strong="H5975"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* breaking \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w ransom|strong="H6299"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w power|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w*; \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, \w where|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w thy|strong="H5641"\w* \w plagues|strong="H1698"\w*? \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w*, \w where|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w thy|strong="H5641"\w* \w destruction|strong="H6987"\w*? \w repentance|strong="H5164"\w* \w shall|strong="H5869"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w mine|strong="H3027"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w fruitful|strong="H6500"\w* \w among|strong="H6500"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brethren, \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H5927"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w coming|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w spring|strong="H4599"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w become|strong="H2717"\w* \w dry|strong="H2717"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w fountain|strong="H4726"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w dried|strong="H2717"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*: \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w spoil|strong="H8154"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* treasure \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w goodly|strong="H2532"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w*.
Samaria shall bear her guilt; for she hath rebelled against her God: they shall fall by the sword; their infants shall be dashed in pieces, and their women with child shall be ripped up.
